snippet: “We are humbled,” Richard Handler, the investment bank’s chief executive, said of the quarter, which was hurt by rocky markets and wary investors.
abstract: Jefferies Group reports first fiscal quarter loss of $166.7 million, compared with profit of $12.5 million in year-ago quarter; revenue fell 49 percent to $299 million.
lead_paragraph: “We are humbled,” Richard Handler, the investment bank’s chief executive, said of the quarter, which was hurt by rocky markets and wary investors.

headline.main: Jefferies Reports $166.7 Million Loss in Quarter
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Jefferies Group Reports Loss of $166 Million in Quarter
